clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics (PK) and Pharmacodynamics (PD) of SH229 in Patients With HCV Infection
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase I Study to Assess Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics (PK) and Pharmacodynamics (PD) of SH229 in Patients With Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infection

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and antiviral activity of single and multiple ascending doses of SH229 in patients with chronic hepatitis C Virus infection.

detailed_description.textblock: A total of 30 evaluable patients will be enrolled in this study. The planned dose levels are 400, 600, and 800 mg.

primary_outcome.measure: Antiviral effects of SH229, as measured by HCV RNA levels

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve(AUC)
